education.school: New York University, Tandon School of Engineering
education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science, Math

experiences.title: Researcher – Graph-Based Vocabulary Mismatch Solution in Information Retrieval
responsibilities: Researched graph-based search expansion for improving vocabulary mismatch in information retrieval.
Designed experiments with various retrieval methods (BM25, DeepImpact, SPLADE, TILDE) and analyzed performance.
Validated effectiveness using multiple dense models (TasB, ColBERT, DeBERTa, MiniLM).

experiences.title: Intern – Industrial Investment Data Analytics
experiences.organization: Sinosure (Guangzhou) Equity Investment Fund Management Co., Ltd.
responsibilities: Built a scalable data pipeline for real-time financial analytics using AWS Lambda and Apache Kafka.
Applied ML/NLP models (XGBoost, BERT) to analyze Series B funding trends and predict profitability.
Developed dashboards with Tableau and Streamlit, improving decision-making efficiency.

projects.title: ShadowDash (Open Source Development)
responsibilities: Developed a C-based declarative language to optimize Ninja build processes, improving efficiency.
Enhanced parallel compilation and automated testing, achieving up to a 2x speedup.

projects.title: DTCC Lab - AI-Powered Code Generation
responsibilities: Engineered AI-driven prompts for Python code generation using ChatGPT API.
Achieved 80%+ execution accuracy for structured prompts, optimizing LLM performance.

projects.title: ContextWIN: Neural Model for Restless Bandits
responsibilities: Developed ContextWIN to enhance decision-making in recommendation systems.
Proved theoretical robustness of NeurWIN and ContextWIN for real-world applications.
